podcast_summary: Once upon a time, there was an exciting era filled with limitless possibilities. People were experiencing a paradigm shift in their digital interactions. Open source projects were exploding with rapid speed, breaking records in both product development and company growth. In the past, the focus had been on creating their own infrastructure, with countless servers at their disposal. However, something new was on the horizon.

- Quote by Jeff Bezos, Founder and CEO of Amazon, from his interview with Charlie Rose (source: CBS News)
